alert.note: Alert for Fluvanna; Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 7:13PM EDT until July 15 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Louisa County in central Virginia... North central Fluvanna County in central Virginia... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 713 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Boswells Tavern, or 12 miles north of Palmyra, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Boswells Tavern around 735 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Zion Crossroads, Waldrop, Green Springs and Gordonsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
